#61fa34 = rgb(97, 250, 52)
61: 6 * 16 + 1 * 1 = 97
FA: F(15)*16 + A(10)*1 = 250
34: 3 * 16 + 4*1 = 52

#34abc6 = rgb(52, 171, 198)
34: 3*16+4=52
AB: A(10)*16+B(11)=171
C6: C(12)*16+6=198


#bfe237 = rgb(191, 226, 55)
BF: B(11)*16+F(15)=191
E2: E(14)*16+2=226
37: 3*16+7=55


#1ab457 = rgb(26, 180, 87)
1A: 1*16+A(10)=261
B4: B(11)*16+4=180
57: 5*16+7=875


#ab34c6 = rgb(171, 52, 198)
AB: A(10)*16+B(11)=171
34: 3*16+4=52
C6: C(12)*16+6=198


#b237fe = rgb(178, 55, 254)
B2: B(11)*16+2=178
37: 3*16+7=55
FE: F(15)*16+E(14)=254


#ab4571 = rgb(171, 69, 113)
AB: A(10)*16+B(11)=171
45: 4*16+5=69
71: 7*16+1=113


#ab4715 = rgb(171, 71, 21)
AB: A(10)*16+B(11)=171
47: 4*16+7=71
15: 1*16+5=21




\
rgb(213, 12, 112) = #D50C70
213 = 16×13+5=D5
12 = 16×0+12=0C
112 = 16×7+0=70

rgb(22, 126, 52) = #167E34
22 = 16×1+6=16
126 = 16×7+14=7E
52 = 16×3+4=34

rgb(213, 214, 41) = #D5D629
213 = 16×13+5=D5
214 = 16×13+6=D6
41 = 16×2+9=29

rgb(113, 22, 113) = #711671
113 = 16×7+1=71
22 = 16×1+6=16
113 = 16×7+1=71

rgb(126, 112, 172) = #7E70AC
126 = 16×7+14=7E
112 = 16×7+0=70
172 = 16×10+12=AC

rgb(142, 24, 241) = #8E18F1
142 = 16×8+14=8E
24 = 16×1+8=18
241 = 16×15+1=F1

rgb(123, 32, 121) = #7B2079
123 = 16×7+11=7B
32 = 16×2+0=20
121 = 16×7+9=79

rgba(127, 123, 224, 0.4) = #7F7BE066
127 = 16×7+15=7F
123 = 16×7+11=7B
224 = 16×14+0=E0
0.4 opacity = 255×0.4 =102  == 16×6+6=66
